name: Jelly Crush - Match 3 Games & Free Puzzle 2019
name_original: Jelly Crush - Match 3 Games & Free Puzzle 2019
description:
WELCOME TO THE MOST AMAZING&ADDICTIVE PUZZLE GAME JELLY🎉CRUSH!

Jelly Crush is one of the most attractive💕 match-3 puzzle games.Slide your fingers to swap,match and crush jellys.We hope it can give you a day in a good mood!😘

Collect various beautiful jellys by playing challenging levels, use the power of jellys to crush blocks in your adventure🏅, solve the puzzles in temple and jungle and seek the treasures💰 in legend! Use your perfect💯match-3 skills to start your legendary adventure in amazing jelly world!

You can connect to Facebook to play with your friends👩👨and see who can get the higher scores in leaderboard!🏆

HOW TO PLAY:
●Match 3 or more similar jellys in a line to collect them.
●Match 4 puzzle pieces create the direction jelly bombs.
●Match 5 in T or L to create powerful bombs.
●Use less moves and more combos of special bombs to get more stars in the level

FEATURES:
●🎉700+ Addictive levels
-Brings you new and fun challenges
●🆓FREE to play
-There are daily free rewards and don’t forget spin the wheel to get awesome bonus
●😄Easy and fun to play yet challenging to master
-Free to use some boosters everyday
●⏳No time limit
-Don’t worry the time limits in level, you can play at any time and any place
●🏆Frequent funny events
-Extra challenge and rewards for you
●📶Offline games
-Do not require Wi-Fi

What are you waiting for?🤔
Download Now!
Join us and Enjoy this miraculous jelly puzzle adventure!😍
